      • addViews

        public void addViews(ReactViewPager parent,
                     java.util.List<android.view.View> views)
        从类复制的说明: ViewGroupManager
        Convenience method for batching a set of addView calls Note that this adds the views to the beginning of the ViewGroup
        覆盖:
        addViews 在类中 ViewGroupManager<ReactViewPager>
        参数:
        parent - the parent ViewGroup
        views - the set of views to add
